body.name: Amazfit T-Rex 2 Smart Watch for Men, 24-Day Battery Life, Dual-Band & 6 Satellite Positioning, Ultra-Low Temperature Operation, Rugged Outdoor GPS Military, Real-time Navigation - Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Jiant Solutions and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 33 mins
features: 【Ready for Action】 The Amazfit T Rex 2 premium GPS smart watch is equipped with 1.39” HD AMOLED always-on display for clear & outstanding visibility while outdoors and it passed 15 Military-standard Tests (MIL-STD-810G) to withstand extreme temperatures and environments, and prove durability even when subjected to intense physical condition..Water resistance depth:100 meters.Suported Application:GPS,Pedometer,Fitness Tracker,Distance Tracking. Connectivity technology:Bluetooth.

【Navigate for Your Exploration】Go beyond adventure with the watch's dual-band positioning and suport for 6 satellite positioning systems, which can effectively reduce environmental interference and achieve more precise positioning. Hikers, climbers, and explorers of any fashion can also conquer new heights and discover new paths with the T-Rex 2's built-in compass and barometric altimeter.

【Conquer the Uncharted】Tread new ground by importing route files from the Zepp App. Your movement along an imported route, and even your unique movement along your own developing route, can be displayed in real-time directly on the watch. Also, the smartwatch can show you the shortest straight line back to the start of your journey, so you can avoid twists and turns when you're in a hurry.

【150plus Sports Modes &10 ATM Water Resistant】 The Amazfit T-Rex 2 sports watch‘s huge selection of over 150 sports modes includes the toughness-testing Triathlon mode, the professional lap-data recording Track Run mode with smart trajectory correction, and the more leisurely Golf Swing mode. And it is 10 ATM water resistant and can withstand splashes, rain or snow, swimming, snorkeling, and other non-high-speed water sports.

【The Power to Endure Any Adventure】With a battery powerful enough to endure adventures upto 24 days with typical usage and 45 days on Battery Saver Mode, the Amazfit T-Rex 2 is brimming with the energy you need to go on the hunt for adventure.

【One Tap for Four Health Metrics】 With the Amazfit T Rex 2 smart fitness watch you can test your heart rate, blood-oxygen saturation, stress level and breathing rate in a single tap of the watch, for a result in as little as 45 seconds. To easily understand your condition without cycling through individual apps, quickly get the data you need in one tap and then get on with your day.

【Sync To Your Favorite Health Apps】 Through the Zepp OS APP, you can connect and sync data to your favorite health and fitness APPs such as Strava, Adidas Running, Apple Health, Google Fit, Relive and Komoot.
【Music Playlist Control】 Keep your phone in your pocket or secured within your backpack as you can conveniently control music playlist on the T-Rex 2 through Bluetooth.

【Your Ultimate Personal Assistant】The Amazfit T-Rex 2 smartwatch notifies you of any incoming text messages or calls, scheduled alarms, and events, to prevent you from missing any important information.
body.description: Evolve your instinct with Amazfit T-Rex 2 rugged outdoor smartwatch. Super-tough from the Inside Out with 15 military-grade tests. Ultra-low Temperature Operation is available in extreme temperatures as low as -22℉. Dual-band & 6 Satellite Positioning for optimized efficiency, faster, more accurate positioning, and also conquer new heights and discover new paths with the T-Rex2's built-in compass and barometric altimeter. With a battery powerful enough to endure adventures up to 24 days, 150+ Built-in Sports Modes & Smart Recognition of 8 Sports. The fitness watch has a water-resistance grade of 10 ATM, meaning it can withstand the equivalent of 100 meters' water pressure. The self-developed 6PD BioTracker™ 3.0 PPG optical sensor provides fast and accurate 24-hour monitoring of heart rate, blood-oxygen saturation (SpO2) and stress levels, allowing you to achieve total health management from your wrist. Compatible with Android 7.0 & iOS 12.0 and above smart devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual-band & 6 Satellite Positioning Go beyond adventure with the watch's dual-band positioning and support 6 satellite positioning systems, which can effectively reduce environmental interference and achieve more precise positioning. Route Import and Real-time Navigation Tread new ground by importing route files from the Zepp App. Your movement along an imported route, and even your unique movement along your own developing route, can be displayed in real-time. The Power to Endure Any Adventure With a battery powerful enough to endure adventures up to 24 days at a time with typical usage, the Amazfit T-Rex 2 is brimming with the energy you need to go on the hunt for adventure. Ultra-low Temperature Operation The watch can be operated in extreme cold as low as -30°C. So not only can the watch body physically resist the cold, but you can keep using the watch's functions as the conditions get more intense. Super-tough from the Inside Out Passed 15 Military-grade Tests Rugged & Bold Trend-setting Design Matte Finish and metal-sprayed Outer Bezel 1.39” HD AMOLED Display 150+ Built-in Sports Modes Go Wild with 150+ Built-in Sports Modes & Smart Recognition of 8 SportsBrave the Storm with 10 ATM Water-resistanceShare Workout Data to Fitness AppsConnect to External Workout Devices

AI-powered Training Guidance The Zepp Coach harnesses the power of AI to provide personalized training plans, tailored to you and your goals. To help you avoid overtraining, this smart coaching algorithm will even track your fatigue level, fitness level and training status in order to give you scientific guidance and let you know when you're ready to step things up, or when to take a rest.

Train the Beast Within Strength Exercise Recognition It can automatically recognize the movements and count the reps of 15 types of strength training exercises and help to create your own training templates, many of which have adjustable variations in the Zepp App, as well as track your rest time between sets to keep your training efficient. Blaze Your Own Trail with Training Templates Create your own training templates for 11 different sports in the Zepp App. Each template can be divided into Warm Up, Training, Rest, Recovery, and Warm Down stages - which can be repeated up to 30 times per template. Interval training templates can also be created directly on the watch.

24H Health Management One Tap for Four Health Metrics The self-developed 6PD BioTracker3.0 PPG optical sensor provides fast and accurate 24-hour monitoring of heart rate, blood-oxygen saturation, and stress levels. It can also detect your breathing rate, and is able to quickly and conveniently measure these 4 important health metrics in one simple tap. Sleep Quality Tracking Sleep quality is essential to health, and so the Amazfit T-Rex 2 serves as your personal sleep assistant. The watch can recognize different sleep states - such as the light, deep and REM sleep stages, as well as daytime naps, and monitors any potential breathing problems during your sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply amazing for the price
reviews.reviewText: The battery, speed, features, durability, clarity, and accuracy are outstanding. You cannot beat the price and quality of this watch.The battery is as good as they say it is. If you use it constantly through the day for various things it will not last the full two weeks but it is still much better than any smart watch I’ve owned. I’m on day 3 now and at 74% battery using it a lot. I’ve fiddled with it through the days using it as often as I can.The OS is smooth and runs very snappy. Running a timer and the stopwatch while using a compass? No problem! Some of the free watch faces have the ability to allow you to go directly to various apps on the device or tells you what is running or if Bluetooth is being actively used.Too many features to go through in a review here but it has plenty of information. There are some watch faces that provide you with tons of useful information. Metrics, date, weather, moon phases, barometric pressure, rain warning, sun rise/set, alarms, screen lock, humidity, etc.. it’s a lot.It’s durability seems to be really good. It is plastic so it’s very light but still feels very solid. I haven’t felt like it’s going to break if I bang it on something (which I have and it is unscathed). The band I think is great but I did see where some people have broken there’s. No worries though because there are replacement bands through AmazFit and aftermarket; I bought an elastic breathable band and replacement was easy. UNSCREW THE LEFT SIDE (side with up and down buttons) ONLY! Otherwise you’ll strip the tool. It requires a special tool so make sure the band you order has the tool to remove the screws. Overall the quality is outstanding.Screen clarity, resolution, and readability in the sun is amazing. It will adjust screen brightness automatically depending on the lighting around you. Colors are vivid.And finally accuracy of the metrics for health and sleep seem reliable. I’m not a health nut so I don’t need it to be 100%. That said it tracks on par with Fitbit and various other watches I’ve used. The graphs and layout of information is very in depth yet easy to read. Sleep tracking seems to be very accurate and comes with an optional subscription to allow ai enhanced ambient sounds customized to your sleep pattern. It learns what helps you sleep better and shuts off at the appropriate time and uses a smart alarm the wake you up slowly within 30 minutes of your set alarm. So not to wake you abruptly.This is a game changer for the price and I’m grateful I chose to try out this watch. As long as Amazfit keeps doing what they’re doing, they have me as a customer for life. 5/5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This watch is awesome.Battery Life --> Medium Use I get two weeks easy. (I have adjustable Brightness turned on works very well)When battery is at 50% the watch charges in about 45 minutes.AI feature --> Detects if turned on when my heart rates gets up over warmup in the 105-110 and suggests an exercise session recording.Love how you can do quick replies on messenger and If you can't take your call it allows you to send a message as to why you can't. Messages are customizable in the app.Note: You can not answer calls or SMS text messages on this watch, but who cares I do not care for those features.Customize Exercise templates to track and work up to your goals. Love that the most.Loads of informationPAIEPOCSleep monitoringHeart rate monitoring while exercising at different LevelsAccurate Step countClose to accurate heart rate tracking....I am talking off by 1/2 a beat or less which is great compared to some of the other watches.App is the Zepp app --> Very good app stable and very smooth to useThere are many features you can add to the watch via app.Watch faces are basic (Freeones)Many different watch faces all from 99 cents to 1.99 Worth it on some of the faces as they can display very clear information and make use of the surface of the watch very optimally.100% Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long Battery Life and great price.
reviews.reviewText: My place of work started a Fitness Competition, so I decided it was time to get a new smart watch to track my fitness activities. I decided to buy the T-Rex2.WHAT I LIKE:- Looks great. It looks like a sports watch, which is my preference.- Battery Life is great. I have turned on all the features and the battery lasts almost a week before having to recharge. I do outdoor biking, and mountain biking 5-6 days of the week.- The Zepp app that pairs with the watch is responsive and easy to use. The information is clear and easy to understand.- Syncing the Zepp app with the watch is fast. I was previously using a Fitbit versa2, and that took 10 times longer to sync using the same phone.- The GPS is pretty accurate. Certainly more accurate then my Fitbit versa2.- The price is quite competitive. I paid $200 with coupon. For the price this watch is a great value.- The screen on the watch is responsive and not sluggish like other watches I've used such as the Fitbit versa2.- There are some decent looking free "skins" you can download to the watch. (image attached). There also skins you can purchase. I like contrast, as well as having all the info viewable on the watch. However you can also use skins that only show time for example.- It is comfortable to wear. Although it has a decent sized screen, it is still quite lightweight. I do not feel like I am wearing a big ol watch. It doesn't get in the way of any of my activities.WHAT I DON'T LIKE (or could use improvement):- Support with other applications / devices is not quite there. This is my biggest issue. For example. The Fitness Competition App my work uses can be paired with a whole host of applications such as google fit, fitbit, applefit etc.. The Zepp app was not supported. Although I cannot confirm, I suspect you will probably not be able to pair Zepp with other devices such as power output monitoring devices many people use on their bikes.- Other features outside of GPS such as the sleep app are not the most accurate. It will give you a decent ball park figure, but if you want to be as accurate as possible you will probably need to look at a much more expensive Garmin that has more sensors.- The band appears to be attached via a non standard screw. My watch watch did not come with a screw driver that I could find. There are custom bands available on the Amazefit website, so I can only assume that when you purchase one it will come with the right screw driver. (image attached).CONCLUSION:The watch is great, especially for the price. The Zepp app is pretty good, however it could use better cross support with other applications and devices. I am happy with the purchase and have since bought an Amazefit watch for my girlfriend. If you are into fitness however not ultra serious about the data collection, this is a great watch for you. If you are a professional athlete or very serious about data collection, you will probably need to look at a $700 Garmin most likely.Cheers, and happy hunting.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sporty GPS Activity Fitness Watch - Great Value
reviews.reviewText: This is my second fitness watch I've ever owned. This is an amazing watch, as a normal watch, the battery lasts over a month on a single charge! I have yet to actually use the power-hungry GPS tracking app, but a very nice fitness watch for tracking my daily steps, heart rate, blood O2 levels, stress levels, sleep habits, weather and call and text message notifications. Lots of free faces available with the included Zepp app, as well as other apps available for downloading watch faces. Pretty accurate measurements, and able to link to other health apps like Google Fitness, Strava, etc. I wear this watch 24/7 and has a nice Theatre Mode, where the display can be dimmed down for sleeping or in light-sensitive areas! Would recommend highly as a fitness watch for anyone! A lot cheaper than other popular big brand names. Lots of included apps, fully customizable to whatever fitness routine you need to capture!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente relógio esportivo, preciso nas medições e com uma duração de bateria incrível
reviews.reviewText: Minhas opiniões :PRÓS : - Um equipamento muito bem construído, um polímero de excelente qualidade e durabilidade e acabamento, uma qualidade no silicone da pulseira muito bom e muito confortável. - Pareamento com o app do celular muito fácil via QR CODE, menus fáceis de acessar e configurar, muitas opções de watch faces, entre outras configurações no geral, de muito fácil acesso. - Pelo que usei de medição de batimentos, oxímetro e GPS, entregou resultados precisos dentro do meu tipo de uso, que não é nada extremo. Pratico corrida ao ar livre, mountain bike e caminhada e o GPS se mostrou praticamente igual ao do celular (Google). - Bateria em um uso padrão durou aprox. 20 dias. Se deixar todos sensores de medição desativados, pode ser q dure aprox. 25 dias. Tudo vai depender se ligar todos sensores de medição do aparelho em um intervalo menor de tempo. Caso o usuário usar medições em intervalos menores, a duração da bateria pode diminuir drasticamente. (o APP de medição do relógio vai emitir um alerta de diminuição da bateria).CONTRAS: - O preço é um dos poucos problemas desse aparelho. Ainda é um aparelho caro que oferece um pouquinho menos opções do que outros concorrentes. Vale ressaltar que o foco do aparelho é durabilidade, construção de um equipamento forte pra práticas esportivas, bons sensores de medição e uma bateria bem durável.

reviews.reviewTitle: All you need, without the cost, and more!! Love it
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, what do you want from a Sporty Smart watch? This looks very decent, gives me the right data about my workouts, sleep patterns, heart rate, stress levels & even has a built in GPS. Full Touchscreen interface, nice vibration notifications, Loads of watch faces to customize, and most importantly for me, a amazingly LONG LONG standby time (seriously, I've used it for a week and it still tells me I got 50% or more battery life) love it... An amazing interface via the ZEPP app and finally, the Price... C'mon for all you're getting, and you think it's expensive, you obviously didn't do your research on the competition at all...Its a solid buy and for all you're getting worth every penny (even if you've already saved by getting this watch)! Just go for it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Battery Life and Sports Software Updated ZEPP app2.1
reviews.reviewText: You need to love Real OUTDOOR Adventure before you start loving this watch !Very Strong outer shell and glass, VERY BRIGHT AMOLED screen , Lighter weight compare to those metal housing eg. Apple Watch Ultra . Can wear the whole day still feels comfortable . Excellent 150+ sports Plus Lots of features for sports motivation specially sense your are walking , running cycling OUTDOORS immediately activated. Accurate GPS tracking your OUTDOOR route. Excellent 10ATM waterproof for swimming NOT yet test to Diving depth to over 100ft or more even it said 330 Ft water depth. Updated ZEPP app 2.1 gave lots added features. Barometer and Altimeter for high mountain climbing can be calibrate with GPS. Very good deal for CAD $207. give you so many function and strong outer shell. Allow you to go to EXTREME temperature and EXTREME -40C cold /70C Hot/ wet environments.This Smart watch actually is a Multiple use, highly sensitive sensors NEED to paired with your Phone. No speaker /mic. NOT for you to talk , Only send you notification from the phone. I believe it seals better for waterproof even to deeper water because NO Speakers/ Mic holes in the housing . It is For serious outdoor sportsman who want to focus on the sports RESULT and adventure OUTDOOR to even extreme. NOT for TALKING on the phone or TEXT to social media often with apps which will cause DISTRACTION when your sporting achievement is HIGH PRIOITY. Like (EVERY -Second -count) situation means more to you than talking, Texting.Amazfit .com will give you very good Tech support fairly fast and send you a Video teach you by email how to use if problem arise.This Adventure USE Watch is ONLY CAD$207+Tax very good deal to me compare to those over CAD 600 -1099.I have not test it with other Expensive Watch in SKYDIVING , SCUBA DIVING to over 100 ft or REAL Amazon Jungle Expedition yet . Not sure if it will survive as the Manufacturer Spcs. listed. Blood Oxygen level TESTED to be 98.5 % accurate most of time.

Produto maravilhoso!Não tem nada a desejar a um modelo da Garmin ou Polar, ou outros smartwhatchs. Além de ser mais da metade do valor!Quando o relógio chegou ele estava com 75% de bateria e durou uma semana inteira antes da carga, e mesmo assim aguentou um dia inteiro nos 15%. Não tive coragem pra ver se ele iria aguentar o dia seguinte e botei pra carregar a noite. Carga completa em 2h! A bateria é maravilhosa! Eu uso ele TODO DIA, então acho que durou bem.GPS super preciso e touch de qualidade. A tela é grande e confortável pra usar e visualizar as informações enquanto se está praticando o esporte.Estou muito contente e super indico o T-Rex pra quem não está disposto a pagar um Garmin da vida e mesmo assim ter um smartwhatch de qualidade e que aguente o tranco!
